noun.description: The action of forming or process of being formed.
examples: the formation of the Great Rift Valley

noun.description: A structure or arrangement of something.
A formal arrangement of aircraft in flight or troops.
examples: the helicopters hovered overhead in formation

noun.description: An assemblage of rocks or series of strata having some common characteristic.

origin: Late Middle English: from Latin formatio(n-), from formare to form (see form).
